## Overview

This creates dataframe from the the kaggle dataset "Datasets of WEBTOON ORIGINALS," and remove unnecessary variables. The dataset used is available in this repository that

```{r}
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jeovany97/Data-607/refs/heads/main/Assignment1/webtoon_originals_en.csv"
webtoon_unedited <- read_csv(url)
webtoon_clean <- webtoon_unedited %>%
  select(-title_id, -authors, -rating, -synopsis)

```

```{r}
head(webtoon_clean)
```
